title: Strengthening Organizational Development Competencies: Refutational Text-Based Microlearning for Correcting Earth Science Misconceptions

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can identify five major misconceptions about Earth's internal structure and plate tectonics with 80% accuracy within three months
Learners can reduce misconception frequency in explanations of geoscientific phenomena by 50% within two weeks after countertext learning
Learners can apply geoscience concepts to real-world cases (geological disasters, landform formation, etc.) with over 70% completeness through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
